channel.title: Webclient Help Please!
channel.description: [size=18pt]I can make one but the auto cache downloader doesn't work and on other persons computers it says error loading,please wait,or click here for details. So I need someone who can properly hook up a web client download cache. If you can help please message me or post here.[/size]

item.title: Webclient Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Go to you’re cache folder .
In C" drive or something.
Then go in the folder where u got the maps, Sprites etc…
Select all Right click and add to archive but add it as a .zip!
like this …

ac4pvm.jpg926×591

You’re cache is now zipped, upload it to a webhost i recomended dropbox and upload it in the public folder after it’s uploaded copy the public link into cachedownloader.java
And in signlink.java search for
Findcachedir

there will be something like this

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = { "C:/" }; String s = "YOURE CACHE NAME"; for (int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if (s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if (!file.exists()) continue; } File file1 = new File(s1 + s); if (file1.exists() || file1.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; } catch (Exception _ex) { }
just replace the “YOURECACHENAME” with you’re cache name

Read full topic

On the other hand, next time your on, pm me or post here, and ill help you make your cache download.
